title: Medical Ethics: Practical Competency Enhancement Through Immersive Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of patient-doctor relationships
context.additional_context: Providing practicing healthcare professionals with hands-on opportunities to address ethical dilemmas, combining VR/AR-based simulations and discussion sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more medical ethics principles (autonomy, beneficence, non-maleficence, justice) applied to real-world cases
Learners can analyze ethical conflict situations and present decision-making processes in immersive simulation environments
Learners propose ethical problem-solving solutions in team-based projects and derive improvements through peer evaluations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
